body_html: @kashif i'm testing urnn's right now on the gpu and it seems that the implementation is pretty slow right now. I hesitate to close the issue right now but I can if you feel that its justified. It does seem that the unitary rnn is about 10x slower than vanilla lstm on a titan x.
